About.title: About me
About.about_me: I'm {age} years old and have a burning passion for creating engaging visual experiences, I'm a dedicated Front-end developer with a year of solid experience. I'm constantly looking to improve my skills, always keeping up to date with the latest trends and technologies in the world of web development. My ultimate goal is to transcend into the Full Stack universe, combining my expertise in design and interactivity to build comprehensive and innovative web solutions. Browsing through my portfolio, you'll find a compilation of projects that reflect my passion for programming and my commitment to delivering exceptional digital experiences.
About.subtitle: | A brief summary of me |
